name: Natural Apptitude
tagline: Software company in Bristol, United Kingdom
description:
Natural Apptitude is a software company based in Bristol. We specialize in making user-focused, bespoke and beautiful smartphone apps and websites.
We work in an increasing number of industry sectors (medicine, ecology, biology, tourism) and adopt development approaches that suit our clients' requirements. We have built an excellent reputation in the field of citizen science and many of our projects are centered around public engagement.
